entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as standing over Harry, looking furious. He is also mentioned to be angry and snarling.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being truthful, standing up, feeling feverish, and questioning Snape.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned by Snape as the Dark Lord.

relationships.description: Snape seems angrier than he had done two minutes before, when Harry had seen into his own memories.
Snape refers to Voldemort as the Dark Lord.
